Package de.teamshrug.scooterms

Class Scooter

java.lang.Object
de.teamshrug.scooterms.Scooter
public class Scooter
extends java.lang.Object
The scooter class can be used by a customer as a vehicle until the battery is empty, the customer pays a fixed price for every minute of travel. When the battery is below 20 percent, its status changes to "lowonbattery" and can now be picked up by a scooter hunter to charge it, the scooter hunter receives a reward for his effort.

    • park

      public void park()
      Calculates the driven distance and deducts the costs from the user and reduces the battery charge (each KM started 1€) If the battery drops under 20% when the scooter is parked, it state changes to lowonbattery and a scooterhunter is able to pick it up for recharging

    • isInRegisteredArea

      public boolean isInRegisteredArea()
      Returns:
      checks if current position is in the registered Area
